item.title: About me
item.description:
$whoami

My name is Rui GonÃ§alo, I work as a Senior SOC Analyst for Kaspersky Lab. I decided to create this blog to share stuff I learned and worked on my own time. I always find that I also learn better when I’m explaining to someone else so this blog is also for me. I will write mostly about infosec areas, such as Malware, Threat Intel and Digital Forensics.

I will always try to publish articles with good detail, since I always like to follow the chain, without going too deep down in the rabbit hole.
